name: DarkCulture by Rune [detune.org]
description:
Like many people, I don't like staring at a lightbulb in a dark room. I visit WhatCulture often, and I find it a crime that nobody has made a dark theme yet. So, I made one!

Hey, if you like this style, please check out my forum and chat website! http://detune.org/

If you're a wrestling fan, we do have a wrestling section! I'd really like to make it grow so please check it out as well! http://detune.org/boards/wrestling
